Title: Long Time Coming
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Meredith Stiehm
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Laila Robins, Tracy Letts
Plot: Back in the States, Carrie and Saul investigate what she saw in Islamabad.
